ptlrpc_service_ops Struct Reference
[net]

Data Fields

int(* so_thr_init )(struct ptlrpc_thread *thr)
 if non-NULL called during thread creation (ptlrpc_start_thread()) to initialize service specific per-thread state.
void(* so_thr_done )(struct ptlrpc_thread *thr)
 if non-NULL called during thread shutdown (ptlrpc_main()) to destruct state created by ->srv_init().
int(* so_req_handler )(struct ptlrpc_request *req)
 Handler function for incoming requests for this service.
int(* so_hpreq_handler )(struct ptlrpc_request *)
 function to determine priority of the request, it's called on every new request
void(* so_req_printer )(void *, struct ptlrpc_request *)
 service-specific print fn
